Verses: 1 ippozhudhu Naan En Nesaridaththil Avarudaiya Dhraatchaththottaththaik Kuriththu En Nesarukketra Oru Paattaip Paaduven; En Nesarukku Magaa Sezhippaana Mettile Oru Dhraatchaththottam Undu.

2 avar Adhai Veliyadaiththu, Adhilulla Karkalaip Porukki, Adhile Narkula Dhraatsachchedigalai Nattu, Adhin Naduvil Oru Koburaththaikkatti, Adhil Aalaiyaiyum Undupanni, Adhu Nalla Dhraatchappazhangalaith Tharumendru Kaaththirundhaar; Adhuvo Kasappaana Pazhangalaith Thandhadhu.
3 erusalemin Kudigale, Yoodhaavin Manushare, Enakkum En Dhraatchaththottaththukkum Nyaayantheerungal.
4 naan En Dhraatchaththottaththirkaaga Seyyaadha Endha Velaiyai Adharku Ini Seyyalaam? Adhu Nalla Dhraatchappazhangalaith Tharumendru Naan Kaaththirukka, Adhu Kasappaana Pazhangalaith Thandhadhenna?
5 ippodhum Naan En Dhraatchaththottaththukku Seyvadhai Ungalukku Arivippen; Adhin Veliyai Eduththuppoduven, Adhu Meyndhupodappadum; Adhin Adaippaith Thagarppen, Adhu Midhiyundupom.

6 adhaip Paazhaakkividuven; Adhin Kilai Narukkappadaamalum, Kalaikoththi Edukkappadaamalum Povadhinaal, Mutchediyum Nerinjilum Mulaikkum; Adhinmel Mazhai Peyyaadhapadikku Megangalukkum Kattalaiyiduven Engiraar.

7 senaigalin Karththarudaiya Dhraatchaththottam Isravelin Vamsame; Avarudaiya Manamagizhchchiyin Naatru Yoodhaavin Manushare; Avar Nyaayaththukkuk Kaaththirundhaar, Idho, Kodumai; Needhikkuk Kaaththirundhaar, Idho, Muraippaadu.
8 thaangalmaaththiram Dhesaththin Naduvil Vaasamaayirukkumpadi Matravargalukku Idamillaamarpogumattum, Veettode Veettai Serththu, Vayalode Vayalaik Koottugiravargalukku Aiyo!
9 senaigalin Karththar En Seviketka Sonnadhu: Meyyaagave Andhath Thiralaana Veedugal Paazhaagum; Periyavaigalum Nerththiyaanavaigalumaagiya Veedugal Kudiyillaadhirukkum.
10 pathther Nilamaagiya Dhraatchaththottam Orepadi Rasam Tharum; Oru Kala Vidhai Oru Kuruni Vilaiyum.
11 saaraayaththai Naadi Adhikaalame Ezhundhu, Madhubaanam Thangalai Soodaakkumpadi Thariththirundhu, Iruttippogumalavum Kudiththukkondeyirukkiravargalukku Aiyo!

12 avargal Suramandalaththaiyum, Thamburuvaiyum, Melaththaiyum, Naagasuraththaiyum, Madhubaanaththaiyum Vaiththu Virundhukondaadugiraargal; Aanaalum Karththarinkiriyaiyai Nokkugiradhumillai; Avar Karaththin Seygaiyai Sindhikkiradhumillai.
13 en Janangal Arivillaamaiyinaal Siraippattuppogiraargal; Avargalil Kadinamullavargal Pattiniyinaal Thoindhupogiraargal, Avargaludaiya Thiralaana Koottaththaar Thaagaththaal Naavarandu Pogiraargal.

14 adhinimiththam Paadhaalam Thannai Virivaakki, Than Vaayai Aavendru Mattillaamal Thirandhadhu; Avargal Magimaiyum, Avargal Thiralkoottamum, Avargal Aadambaramum, Avargalil Kalikoorugiravargalum Adharkul Irangippovaargal.
15 siriyavan Thaazhththappaduvaan, Periyavanum Thaazhchchiyadaivaan; Mettimaiyaanavargalin Kangal Thaazhndhupom.
16 senaigalin Karththar Nyaayaththeerppinaal Uyarndhu, Parisuththamulla Dhevan Needhiyinaal Parisuththaraai Vilanguvaar.
17 appozhudhu Aattukkuttigal Kandavidamellaam Meyum; Kozhuththavargaludaiyadhaayirundhu Paazhaaippona Nilangalaip Paradhesigal Anubavippaargal.
18 maayaiyin Kayirugalaal Akkiramaththaiyum, Vandil Vadangalaal Paavaththaiyum Izhuththukkonduvandhu,

19 naam Paarkkumpadi Avar Theeviriththuth Thamadhu Kiriyaiyai Seekkiramaai Nadappikkattumendrum, Isravelin Parisuththarudaiya Aalosanaiyai Naam Ariyumpadi Adhu Sameebiththu Varattumendrum Sollugiravargalukku Aiyo!

20 theemaiyai Nanmaiyendrum, Nanmaiyaith Theemaiyendrum Solli, Irulai Velichchamum, Velichchaththai Irulumaagap Paaviththu, Kasappaith Thiththippum, Thiththippaik Kasappumendru Saadhikkiravargalukku Aiyo!
21 thangal Paarvaikku Gnaanigalum, Thangal Ennaththukku Buththimaangalumaai Irukkiravargalukku Aiyo!
22 saaraayaththaik Kudikka Veerarum, Madhuvaik Kalandhuvaikkap Paraakkiramasaaligalumaayirundhu,
23 paridhaanaththirkaagak Kutravaaliyai Needhimaanaagath Theerththu, Needhimaanin Nyaayaththai Avanukku Virodhamaaip Purattugiravargalukku Aiyo!

24 idhinimiththam Akkinijuvaalai Vaikkolaip Patchippadhupolavum, Seththaiyaanadhu Neruppukku Iraiyaagi Erindhupovadhupolavum, Avargal Ver Vaadi, Avargal Thulir Thoosiyaippol Parandhupogum; Avargal Senaigalin Karththarudaiya Vedhaththai Veruththu, Isravelilulla Parisuththarudaiya Vasanaththai Asattaipanninaargale.

25 aagaiyaal Karththarudaiya Kobam Thamadhu Janangalukku Virodhamaai Moondadhu; Avar Thamadhu Kaiyai Avargalukku Virodhamaai Neetti Parvadhangal Adhiraththakkadhaayum, Avargal Pinangal Naduveedhigalil Kuppaipolaagaththakkadhaayum, Avargalai Adiththaar; Ivai Ellaavatrilum Avarudaiya Kobam Aaraamal, Innum Avarudaiya Kai Neettinapadiye Irukkiradhu.
26 avar Dhooraththilulla Jaadhiyaarukku Oru Kodiyai Etri, Avargalai Boomiyin Kadaiyaandharangalilirundhu Payilkaatti Azhaippaar; Appozhudhu Avargal Theeviramum Vegamumaai Varuvaargal.
27 avargalil Vidaaiththavanum Idarugiravanum Illai; Thoongugiravanum Urangugiravanum Illai; Avargalil Oruvanudaiya Iduppin Kachchai Avizhvadhum, Paadharatchaigalin Vaar Arundhupovadhum Illai.

28 avargal Ambugal Koormaiyum, Avargal Villugalellaam Naanetrinavaigalum, Avargal Kudhiraigalin Kulambugal Karpaaraiyaaga Ennappattavaigalum, Avargal Urulaigal Suzhalkaatrukku Oththavaigalumaayirukkum.
29 avargal Kerchchippu Singaththin Kerchchippupolirukkiradhu; Paalasingangalaippolak Kerchchiththu, Urumi, Iraiyaip Pidiththu Thappuvikkiravan Illaamal, Adhai Eduththukkondupoividuvaargal.
30 annaalil, Samuththiram Iraivadhupol Avargalukku Virodhamaai Iraivaargal; Appozhudhu Dhesaththaippaarththaal, Idho, Andhagaaramum Viyaagulamum Undu; Adhin Megangalinaal Velichcham Irundupom.
